desc:
Please would you confirm if any judgments have been verified this year where the consumer did not have an ID number but rather a passport number?

And, if there are judgments that have been verified as per above, how many per month were there?

And, if there are judgments that have been verified as per above, were any of them sent to Experian?

And, are these types of judgments included in the extract to Experian as per the current rule set?
name: CW - CCW219 - Judgments verified this year where no ID
